channel.title: [317 client auto patcher] should it be released
channel.description: i have finally made a 317 client with auto patcher it works very good but the thing is that it has never been done and i think if i release it then all the leechers are going to try and claim that they made it. give me some feed back if i should release it and if i do all the files will be encrypted so leechers cant clain it hehe. and it will also work on all the other clients out there. it cost about 42$ to copyright the auto patcher should that be done first or what. it also has a server side that works on your computer that works the auto patcher that is built in the client.

item.title: [317 client auto patcher] should it be released
item.dc:creator: @Zh1 Zh
item.description:
@Zh1 wrote:

2Speced’s client has a Patcher.

Read full topic
item.source: [317 client auto patcher] should it be released

item.title: [317 client auto patcher] should it be released
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

By ‘auto patcher’ I assume you mean that it updates the client to the latest version before running it? If so, of course it has been done before, I would even call it almost trivial. MoparScape has that ability for one, along with others I am sure.

If you are going to release it, release it under the GNU/GPL license (or another open source license), or don’t release it at all.

Read full topic
item.source: [317 client auto patcher] should it be released

the launcher for the client is a exe. it dont run off a .bat file hehe after the autopatcher patches the client and when its done then the client will start hehe nice huh
